title: Conference Call on Major Initiative to Reform Health Care and Reduce Costs | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 10, 2009

 



Conference Call on Major Initiative to Reform Health Care and Reduce Costs




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary _____________________________________________________________________________ For Immediate Release                                      May 10, 2009   TODAY: Conference Call on Major Initiative to Reform Health Care and Reduce Costs  Today at 3:00 PM EDT, senior administration officials will hold an embargoed background conference call to outline a major initiative on reforming the health care system to reduce costs. The initiative will be officially announced at the White House on Monday. THE CALL IS EMBARGOED FOR 9:00 PM THIS EVENING. What:     Embargoed background conference call with senior administration officials When:     TODAY at 3:00 PM EDT Dial-in:  (800) 230-1059
